author: Joe Flint
title: Stormy Daniels Delivers CBS’s ‘60 Minutes’ Its Biggest Audience in a Decade
text:
CBS’s “60 Minutes” drew more than 21 million viewers Sunday night for an interview with former adult-film star Stephanie Clifford about her alleged sexual encounter with President Donald Trump, marking the news magazine’s biggest audience in 10 years.
According to preliminary figures from ratings firm Nielsen, 21.3 million people watched Anderson Cooper’s interview with Ms. Clifford, who goes by the professional name Stormy Daniels. The telecast benefited from a strong lead-in provided by an NCAA men’s tournament basketball...
